title: Fix MCQ marks to 1, add upload/generation success popups, and show generated paper preview

requirements.summary: Update MCQ category display from current marks value to consistently show 1 mark throughout the frontend UI
acceptanceCriteria: MCQ questions are consistently displayed as 1 mark in the UI
Paper generation correctly calculates total marks with MCQ as 1 mark each
Generated paper preview shows MCQ section with 1 mark per question

file_operations.description: Update the category badge display logic to show '1 Mark' for mcqOneMark category instead of the current marks value
Update the total marks calculation in the handleGenerate function to use 1 mark per MCQ question when computing the paper's total marks
Update the section rendering logic to display '(1 mark each)' for Section A (MCQ) in the paper preview
Update the PDF generation logic to correctly display MCQ section with 1 mark per question and ensure accurate total marks calculation in the generated PDF

requirements.summary: Fix the paper preview display by automatically navigating to the preview page after successful paper generation
acceptanceCriteria: After clicking Generate Paper button, the paper preview displays without requiring manual navigation
All 5 variants (A-E) are visible in the preview
Questions are properly organized into sections A, B, and C

file_operations.description: Add navigation logic using useNavigate hook to automatically redirect to the paper preview page (/paper-preview) after the paper generation completes successfully, passing the generated paper data via navigation state

requirements.summary: Add success popup notification in AddQuestion.tsx after bulk file upload completes
acceptanceCriteria: Popup appears immediately after file upload completes
Message clearly states the file was successfully uploaded and processed
Popup includes the count of questions successfully added
Popup can be dismissed by the user

file_operations.description: Add a success toast/dialog notification in the handleBulkUpload function that displays after the bulkUploadMutation succeeds, showing the count of questions added and allowing user dismissal

requirements.summary: Add success popup notification in GeneratePaper.tsx after paper generation with automatic preview navigation
acceptanceCriteria: Popup appears immediately after paper generation completes
Message confirms successful generation of all 5 paper variants
After popup is dismissed or auto-closes, user is redirected to the paper preview page
The generated paper data is correctly passed to the preview page

file_operations.description: Add a success toast/dialog notification in the handleGenerate function that displays after paper generation completes, confirms all 5 variants (A-E) were created, and automatically navigates to the paper preview page with the generated paper data after dismissal or auto-close
